post.title: P2P Advanced Network Pack for WinXP
post.title_plain: P2P Advanced Network Pack for WinXP
post.content: I didn’t notice, but the Advanced Networking Pack for WinXP was released last week. It’s available on Windows Update, or you can download it as well as the SDK from MSDN. The API is C based. That’s right. Not COM, not managed, not even C++ objects. Like I said about the RTC Client v1.2 API, this API is ripe for wrapping in managed code.
